title: Fantasy Esports LFM
body:
Fantasy Esports is looking to find a new Mid laner. Looking for High plat and up. Doesn't matter what your champion pool is. 

Please Answer these questions

IGN ?
Role
Top 3 picks
Availability
Current rank


Ps. This is a serious ranked team. if you are looking for a casual team, or not willing to be commited to the team schedule please do not apply. Flaming team mates will not be tolerated.
